stimulusHtml: The stylistic innovations that are evident in the relief sculpture of Akhenaton, Nefertiti, and three daughters are a result of
choicesHtml: the introduction of a new monotheistic religion under the Pharaoh Akhenaton
the introduction of Asian art to New Kingdom Egypt through the Silk Road
the rise of a wealthy Egyptian merchant class who created a demand for new types of luxury objects
the shift of the political system during the Amarna period from a kingdom to an oligarchy
